FactionDef.label: The Enclave
FactionDef.description: You are operatives of the Enclave, the shadow government that considers itself the rightful heir to the United States of America. Armed with advanced pre-war technology and an unwavering belief in your genetic and technological superiority, you seek to restore America to its former glory - by any means necessary. The wasteland is filled with mutants and degenerates who have no place in the new America you will build.
